main event: A witness observed a silver metallic rough object about the size of a quarter in Brookville, Ohio on November 5, 1957.
interesting points: The observation lasted approximately 30 seconds., The object was described as having a silver and translucent color., The observer reported the object was not important enough to phone in a report., There were no other confirmed witnesses noted in the report., The observer did not provide a detailed explanation for the sighting.
witness description: the observer did not provide specific details about themselves
